narratives.title: DeFi: Rust Acceleration
narratives.description: Detected 3 signals across github indicating emerging activity in defi. Key themes include: rust, solana, programs, defi, percolator. This represents new financial primitives and protocols being built on Solana.

signals.content: psyto/matcher-sdk: Shared Rust library for Percolator custom matching programs on Solana

psyto/percolator-matchers: Custom matching programs for the Percolator perpetual futures engine on Solana. Each matcher plugs into Percolator's CPI interface to provide specialized pricing, compliance, or execution logic.
psyto/stratum: State primitives for Solana programs built with Anchor.

ideas.title: Developer SDK for Defi
ideas.description: Build a comprehensive TypeScript/Rust SDK that simplifies integration with defi-related protocols. Include code examples, CLI tools, and testing utilities.
ideas.reasoning: With 3 signals showing development activity, there's clear demand for tooling. Developers need easier ways to build on this narrative.

ideas.title: DeFi Analytics Dashboard
ideas.description: Real-time dashboard aggregating all defi activity on Solana. Track metrics, compare protocols, and identify trends before they go mainstream.
ideas.reasoning: Cross-source signals (1 sources) indicate fragmented information. Users need a single place to monitor this space.

ideas.title: Simplified DeFi Aggregator
ideas.description: User-friendly mobile app that aggregates best rates across  protocols. One-tap optimal routing.
ideas.reasoning: High velocity (2.0x) shows rapid innovation, but complexity is increasing. Users need simplification.

ideas.title: "DeFi on Solana" Interactive Course
ideas.description: Comprehensive video course + interactive coding challenges teaching developers how to build in this space. Include real-world examples from detected protocols.
ideas.reasoning: Emerging narrative with 0 key voice mentions. Early educational content can capture attention as ecosystem grows.
ideas.targetAudience: Developers new to this Solana vertical

ideas.title: Smart Alert & Automation Platform
ideas.description: Custom alerts and automated actions for defi, percolator, perpetuals events. Set conditions, get notified, auto-execute strategies.
ideas.reasoning: High velocity (2.0x growth) means things move fast. Users need automation to keep up and capitalize on opportunities.

narratives.title: DeFi: Bitcoin Acceleration
narratives.description: Detected 4 signals across github indicating emerging activity in defi. Key themes include: bitcoin, bitcoin-wallet, crypto-wallet, defi, ethereum. This represents new financial primitives and protocols being built on Solana.

signals.content: Trending: gemwalletcom/gem-ios - Gem - Open Source iOS Crypto Wallet

horizontalsystems/unstoppable-wallet-android: A powerful non-custodial multi-wallet for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain, Avalanche, Solana and other blockchains. Non-custodial crypto and NFT storage, onchain decentralized exchange, institutional grade analytics for cryptcurrency and NFT markets, extensive privacy controls and human oriented design. Implemented on Kotlin.

horizontalsystems/unstoppable-wallet-ios: Multi-wallet for Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Smart Chain and other emerging blockchains. Non-custodial storage, decentralized exchange, and extensive analytics for thousands of tokens and NFTs. Implemented on Swift.
gemwalletcom/gem-android: Gem - Open Source Android Crypto Wallet
